instructions: Connect HTC 10 to the computer using the supplied USB Type-C cable. On HTC 10 , unlock the screen if it's locked. On the pop-up message that asks whether to use USB for file transfers, tap Yes . If you don't see this message, slide the Notifications panel open, tap the Use USB for notification, and then tap Transfer files . You'll then see options for viewing or importing files on the computer screen. Choose to view files. Copy the files from your computer to HTC 10 , or vice versa. After copying the files, disconnect HTC 10 from the computer.
